name: troughing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
trough
trough verb
(EAT)
[ T ] UK to eat something quickly and eagerly, especially in large amounts: She was sitting there troughing chocolate.

trough verb
(LOW LEVEL)
[ I ] to reach a low level, price, etc. before going up again: The economy troughed six months ago and is now growing again.
